country_decisions = {
    # Code generated by elysian highways/elysian_highways_road_check.py
    to_construct_south_elysian_highway = {
		potential = {
		    nhs_check_all_elysian_tags = { CONDITION = tag }
			has_global_flag = to_elysian_highways_project_tier_1
		}

		provinces_to_highlight = {
			to_elysian_highway_south_province_trigger = { TRIGGER = province_id }
		}

		allow = {
			treasury = 500
			917 = {
				to_has_elysian_highway_modifier = yes
			}
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = to_owns_elysian_highway_south_tt
				any_province = {
					to_elysian_highway_south_province_trigger = { TRIGGER = province_id }
					country_or_subject_or_ally_or_ally_subject_holds = { TAG = ROOT }
				}
			}
		}

		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					ai = no
				}
				add_treasury = -500
			}
			else = {
				add_treasury = -250
			}
			set_global_flag = to_elysian_highways_south_enabled
			custom_tooltip = to_elysian_highway_south_provinces_effect_list_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				every_province = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { to_has_elysian_highway_modifier = yes }
						NOT = { has_province_modifier = nhs_elysian_highways_inactive }
						to_elysian_highway_south_province_trigger = { TRIGGER = province_id }
					}
					add_permanent_province_modifier = {
						name = nhs_elysian_highways_inactive
						duration = -1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				num_of_loans = 1
			}
		}
	}
    to_construct_coastal_elysian_highway = {
		potential = {
		    nhs_check_all_elysian_tags = { CONDITION = tag }
			has_global_flag = to_elysian_highways_project_tier_2
		}

		provinces_to_highlight = {
			to_elysian_highway_coastal_province_trigger = { TRIGGER = province_id }
		}

		allow = {
			treasury = 1500
			4887 = {
				to_has_elysian_highway_modifier = yes
			}
			918 = {
				to_has_elysian_highway_modifier = yes
			}
			2528 = {
				to_has_elysian_highway_modifier = yes
			}
			2529 = {
				to_has_elysian_highway_modifier = yes
			}
			4884 = {
				to_has_elysian_highway_modifier = yes
			}
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = to_owns_elysian_highway_coastal_tt
				any_province = {
					to_elysian_highway_coastal_province_trigger = { TRIGGER = province_id }
					country_or_subject_or_ally_or_ally_subject_holds = { TAG = ROOT }
				}
			}
		}

		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					ai = no
				}
				add_treasury = -1500
			}
			else = {
				add_treasury = -750
			}
			set_global_flag = to_elysian_highways_coastal_enabled
			custom_tooltip = to_elysian_highway_coastal_provinces_effect_list_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				every_province = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { to_has_elysian_highway_modifier = yes }
						NOT = { has_province_modifier = nhs_elysian_highways_inactive }
						to_elysian_highway_coastal_province_trigger = { TRIGGER = province_id }
					}
					add_permanent_province_modifier = {
						name = nhs_elysian_highways_inactive
						duration = -1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				num_of_loans = 1
			}
		}
	}
    to_construct_vinlandic_elysian_highway = {
		potential = {
		    nhs_check_all_elysian_tags = { CONDITION = tag }
			has_global_flag = to_elysian_highways_project_tier_2
		}

		provinces_to_highlight = {
			to_elysian_highway_vinlandic_province_trigger = { TRIGGER = province_id }
		}

		allow = {
			treasury = 1000
			953 = {
				to_has_elysian_highway_modifier = yes
			}
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = to_owns_elysian_highway_vinlandic_tt
				any_province = {
					to_elysian_highway_vinlandic_province_trigger = { TRIGGER = province_id }
					country_or_subject_or_ally_or_ally_subject_holds = { TAG = ROOT }
				}
			}
		}

		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					ai = no
				}
				add_treasury = -1000
			}
			else = {
				add_treasury = -500
			}
			set_global_flag = to_elysian_highways_vinlandic_enabled
			custom_tooltip = to_elysian_highway_vinlandic_provinces_effect_list_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				every_province = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { to_has_elysian_highway_modifier = yes }
						NOT = { has_province_modifier = nhs_elysian_highways_inactive }
						to_elysian_highway_vinlandic_province_trigger = { TRIGGER = province_id }
					}
					add_permanent_province_modifier = {
						name = nhs_elysian_highways_inactive
						duration = -1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				num_of_loans = 1
			}
		}
	}
    to_construct_north_elysian_highway = {
		potential = {
		    nhs_check_all_elysian_tags = { CONDITION = tag }
			has_global_flag = to_elysian_highways_project_tier_1
		}

		provinces_to_highlight = {
			to_elysian_highway_north_province_trigger = { TRIGGER = province_id }
		}

		allow = {
			treasury = 800
			917 = {
				to_has_elysian_highway_modifier = yes
			}
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = to_owns_elysian_highway_north_tt
				any_province = {
					to_elysian_highway_north_province_trigger = { TRIGGER = province_id }
					country_or_subject_or_ally_or_ally_subject_holds = { TAG = ROOT }
				}
			}
		}

		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					ai = no
				}
				add_treasury = -800
			}
			else = {
				add_treasury = -400
			}
			set_global_flag = to_elysian_highways_north_enabled
			custom_tooltip = to_elysian_highway_north_provinces_effect_list_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				every_province = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { to_has_elysian_highway_modifier = yes }
						NOT = { has_province_modifier = nhs_elysian_highways_inactive }
						to_elysian_highway_north_province_trigger = { TRIGGER = province_id }
					}
					add_permanent_province_modifier = {
						name = nhs_elysian_highways_inactive
						duration = -1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				num_of_loans = 1
			}
		}
	}

			has_global_flag = to_elysian_highways_project_tier_3
		}

		provinces_to_highlight = {

		}

		allow = {
			treasury = 2500
			4887 = {
				to_has_elysian_highway_modifier = yes
			}
			918 = {
				to_has_elysian_highway_modifier = yes
			}
			2528 = {
				to_has_elysian_highway_modifier = yes
			}

				tooltip = to_owns_elysian_highway_west_tt

					to_elysian_highway_west_province_trigger = { TRIGGER = province_id }
					country_or_subject_or_ally_or_ally_subject_holds = { TAG = ROOT }
				}
			}
		}

		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					ai = no
				}
				add_treasury = -2500
			}
			else = {
				add_treasury = -1250
			}
			set_global_flag = to_elysian_highways_west_enabled
			custom_tooltip = to_elysian_highway_west_provinces_effect_list_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				every_province = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { to_has_elysian_highway_modifier = yes }
						NOT = { has_province_modifier = nhs_elysian_highways_inactive }
						to_elysian_highway_west_province_trigger = { TRIGGER = province_id }
					}
					add_permanent_province_modifier = {
						name = nhs_elysian_highways_inactive
						duration = -1
					}
				}
			}
		}

			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				num_of_loans = 1
			}
		}

    to_construct_atlas_elysian_highway = {
		potential = {
		    nhs_check_all_elysian_tags = { CONDITION = tag }
			has_global_flag = to_elysian_highways_project_tier_3
		}

		provinces_to_highlight = {
			to_elysian_highway_atlas_province_trigger = { TRIGGER = province_id }
		}

		allow = {
			treasury = 2500
			917 = {
				to_has_elysian_highway_modifier = yes
			}
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
				tooltip = to_owns_elysian_highway_atlas_tt
				any_province = {
					to_elysian_highway_atlas_province_trigger = { TRIGGER = province_id }
					country_or_subject_or_ally_or_ally_subject_holds = { TAG = ROOT }
				}
			}
		}

		effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					ai = no
				}
				add_treasury = -2500
			}
			else = {
				add_treasury = -1250
			}
			set_global_flag = to_elysian_highways_atlas_enabled
			custom_tooltip = to_elysian_highway_atlas_provinces_effect_list_tt
			hidden_effect = {
				every_province = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { to_has_elysian_highway_modifier = yes }
						NOT = { has_province_modifier = nhs_elysian_highways_inactive }
						to_elysian_highway_atlas_province_trigger = { TRIGGER = province_id }
					}
					add_permanent_province_modifier = {
						name = nhs_elysian_highways_inactive
						duration = -1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				num_of_loans = 1
			}
		}
	}
